TopicTitle: Mechjeb ascent guidance does not autowarp

Articles.Content:
hi, I can't figure out why this vessel does not autowarp until the Intermediate altitude and the Autopilot Status remains in "Fine Tuning Intermediate Altitude".
can someone explain me?

Video: https://www.dropbox.com/s/98bah3w26xe6m5m/2020-10-04 06-22-20.mkv?dl=0

Edited October 4, 2020 by antipro

@antipro A common reason is you don't have enough reaction wheels to rotate to the next maneuver node.  MechJeb will rotate the rocket to point at the next maneuver node before warp.  If you don't have reaction wheels or they are too small to easily turn the rocket you may never see it warp.

Edited October 4, 2020 by Tonka Crash

ty but I think I have enough reaction wheels.
anyway no maneuver node is created before the ship reaches the 1st Ap(Intermediate Altitude, 32km) and it accelerates until the new Ap is equal to the MJ Orbit Altitude(62Km),
only at this point a node is created at 62Km in order to circularize, then the ship rotates and starts warp.
 

Edited October 4, 2020 by antipro
